page.title: 05Entertainment in Upperton
page.content: Upperton and Brightwell Baldin do not contain any cineamas, theatres or other places of entertainment. So most people have hobbies like riding, gardening, sewing ad painting. Two ladies we talked to did sewing for Drapes of Watlington. In the summer there are several fetes, in Brightwell and other villages. Also every Tuesday at the manor house at Britwell, the swimming pool is open for people from the nearby villages. Mothers take it in turns to look after all the young children for one day each week. They then have the rest of the week free. If people wish to go to the cinema or theatre they would have to go to a town like Wallingford, Henley or Oxford. The nearest place for clubs in Watlington, except for the women's Christian Fellowship in Brihtwell Baldwin.
